descriptionHtml:
This mod uses the VANILLA textures from Skyrim. I could not find the texture for the mask in the high res update. If anyone knows the file location, I would be grateful if you could tell me. Thanks.

This mod is a retexture of Konahrik.
The ID for this item is \'00061CD6\'

INSTALLATION
Extract the \'textures\' folder and all its contents to the Skyrim \'Data\' folder. 

UNINSTALLATION
Delete the files that you extracted to the Data folder. Do not simply delete the \'textures\' folder as this may contain files for other mods.
Instead, find the file \'dragonpriesthelmultra\' which will be in textures\\armour\\dragonpriesthelm.

Credit to Bethesda for the original texture.

Credit to Baraban for his amazing mod which you can see me using in one of the pictures.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90442981
author: froggywoggy
